message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth discussing. My initial offer is $14000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer of $13500 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with $13000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13200 for the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with $13100 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I am willing to consider a price of $13150 for the product, reflecting its value to both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with $13100 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I am willing to agree on a price of $13125 for the product, considering its value to both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with $13100 for the product.
